divs: Sighting DetailsI had just taken my dogs out to do their business and come back in the house. I was about to lay back down in bed but saw this light in the sky outside of my bedroom window. At first I thought it was a plane but it remained stationary and I watched the brightness of the object changed from an intense white to a kind of bluish white then red and just slowly dim out. I awakened my wife who also saw the object before it dimmed out.
trends: There has been one other sighting in North Utica
There were no other sightings in North Utica on or around July 14th 2012
